meta.description: Fideo is a free and open-source software that can record live streams from popular platforms like Bilibili, Douyu, and Huya.

header.description: A powerful, free, and open-source software that lets you easily record popular live streams. It monitors streams in real-time, automatically adjusts to resolution changes, and ensures high recording quality. Compatible with both Mac and Windows.

easy_to_use.title: Easy to Use, One-Click Recording
easy_to_use.desc: Simple and user-friendly. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, start recording effortlessly with just one click.

monitor_stream.title: Real-Time Monitoring, Auto Recording
monitor_stream.desc: Monitors streams in real-time and automatically restarts recording when resolution changes to ensure quality.

resolution_change.title: Accurate Detection, Clear Picture
resolution_change.desc: Detects resolution changes, solving screen tearing issues. Enjoy a clear and smooth recording experience.

question1.title: Which version should I download?
question1.content: Mac M-series users should download the arm64.dmg version. Other Mac users, download the x64.dmg. Windows users, download the .exe.

question2.title: How do I record a stream and what do the settings mean?
question2.content: Click 'Start Recording', enter the stream URL, and click 'Start Preview' to begin.

question4.title: What if Windows flags it as a virus?
question4.content: Ignore it. Fideo is open-source and safe.

question8.title: Why am I not receiving notifications with the Xizhi Key?
question8.content: Notifications are sent only when the software is minimized.
